alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 4:26AM CDT until August 07 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Johnson County in western Arkansas... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 425 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Cass, or 16 miles northeast of Ozark, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dillen... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Catalpa... Fort Douglas... Yale... Friley... Ozone... Haw Creek Falls Campground... Oark... Wolf Pen Campground... Mineral Springs Recreation Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
